title: Understanding Challenges and Designing Frameworks for Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary teaching-learning theories and experience in guiding social studies curricula
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service and in-service teachers to strengthen Project-Based Learning (PBL) application competencies in social studies education.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three major challenges that arise during PBL (Project-Based Learning) implementation.
Learners can present at least two principles for designing a PBL framework aligned with the learning context.
Learners can develop a PBL assessment rubric utilizing digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
